attributes.action: to bring tougher measures on foreign trucks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have got to see the goverment get tougher on  foreign trucks and drivers that come on to the uk roads.
the goverment choose to ignore the fact that a huge amount of the trucks are unroadworthy and the the drivers are flouting the law by working excessive hours putting peoples lives at risk.Since 2006, when my husband was killed at the hands of one of these drivers things are worst how many more have to die!!!! do something now!!
